Package Steganography.Modals

Class AlertBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • Steganography.Modals.AlertBox

  • public class AlertBox
extends java.lang.Object
    The AlertBox class is uses the JavaFX Alert modal to display either caught error messages or various information about a successful steganography process.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AlertBox​()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void error​(java.lang.String header, java.lang.String content)
      Displays an error Alert box to display a caught error during the steganographic process.
      static void information​(java.lang.String header, java.lang.String content, java.io.File file)
      Displays a success prompt after embeding data into an image or extracting a document or an image inside an image.
      static void information​(java.lang.String header, java.lang.String content, java.lang.String message)
      Displays a success prompt after extracting a message inside an image.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • AlertBox

        public AlertBox​()

    • Method Detail

      • error

        public static void error​(java.lang.String header,
                         java.lang.String content)
        Displays an error Alert box to display a caught error during the steganographic process.
        Parameters:
        header - error header
        content - general information about the error (usually from the getMessage method from the Java Exception class)

      • information

        public static void information​(java.lang.String header,
                               java.lang.String content,
                               java.io.File file)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Displays a success prompt after embeding data into an image or extracting a document or an image inside an image.
        Parameters:
        header - information header
        content - success message
        file - image or document to display
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs when opening the file.

      • information

        public static void information​(java.lang.String header,
                               java.lang.String content,
                               java.lang.String message)
        Displays a success prompt after extracting a message inside an image.
        Parameters:
        header - success header
        content - success message
        message - extracted message
